name: Chop Chop Soccer
description:
GOAL!.... Chop Chop fast action soccer now comes to Brazil! Better looking than ever.

Top 10 downloaded game in over 10 countries!
Full Retina display!
Are you ready for the European Championship?

"Chop Chop Soccer wins the iOS championship" - Cnet.com
“Intuitive game of simple fun” – Slide to Play
“Unique footy experience for all styles of players” –Frisky Mongoose
“Refreshing” –Gamezebo

Chop Chop Soccer is a fast paced 3v3 soccer game! Dribble your way through defenders or pick
it apart with perfect passes. Can you beat the goalkeeper?

Play as one of the 12 original teams and enhance your experience with the Ultimate Pack
available in the Chop Chop Shop. 4 new teams, 4 new stadiums, 4 new tournaments!

Are you up to the challenge?

Features:
*Fast paced 3v3 games
*Intuitive gameplay
*Easy to play
*Colorful & cartoonish graphics
*Lots of teams/stadiums
*Full Retina Display!

Join the community on Facebook: www.facebook.com/gamerizon
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/gamerizon

Chop Chop Soccer™ is a trademark from Gamerizon Studios Inc.
